channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Weed, wages and same-sex marriage: The most intriguing ballot measures that voters will decide in November
item.description: Across the U.S. in November, voters will weigh proposals on election policies, minimum wage increases and marijuana legalization.

item.title: United Arab Emirates Fund in Talks to Invest in OpenAI
item.description: The ChatGPT creator has told potential backers its annualized revenue recently reached $4 billion.

item.title: Microsoft Lays Off 650 Videogame Workers
item.description: The terminations mark the latest round of job cuts for game employees since the software giant’s purchase of Activision Blizzard.

item.title: Poll: Americans favor Supreme Court term limits, oppose more justices
item.description: President Joe Biden called this summer for 18-year term limits for the justices, with future presidents able to nominate a justice every two years.
